name: Opal Hall
text:
Very friendly staff. Good food, especially for the location. Pleasant and chill atmosphere, where it doesn’t feel rushed. Good music, lighting and very sweet waitresses. No wait for a table. Late night hours are probably lit 🔥
I brought my 4 year old and everyone was very cool to us, even though it was getting later in the evening.

name: Mira Polion
text: The food was very good and flavorful! I love that they are open so late and they have a drive thru window. I'll definitely be back!

name: Rhonda Hatcher
text: We love this place! The food is amazing and the staff are friendly, pleasant and provide excellent service. Wonderful atmosphere!

name: Janelle Dunn
text: Great food and staff. You won't be disappointed.

name: Thia Chambers
text: The food was well seasoned and tasty. Little pricey for the serving size though. But would definitely return!

name: Dione Hubbard
text: This restaurant is off the chain!  The food was amazing!  The quality customer service was the best I have experienced in Birmingham.  Classy lounge.

name: Tee W
text: Great restaurant,  chill/laid back atmosphere.  The Surf and Turf burger was extremely good!  Mia, our waitresses, provided excellent customer service!  She's the big reason why we'll be coming back.   The owner also came out to greet us.   Definitely recommend!

name: Rasheen Harris
text: I've been coming to this spot for almost 2 weeks and several times even now I've been in here for over 5 hours . Amazing Customer service .. spectacular food you gotta come experience this vibe ...very upscale . I suggest bringing your friends and family here you will be amazed ...11am-2am best vibe in the city

name: Jaquan Readus
text: The staff was very friendly service was great food even better. It's not fast food quick but it's fast for that quality of food. They are new so they are still working out some kinks.

name: E. S.
text: Yesterday, ordered the Fried Grouper(fried to perfection) with Green Beans and their Smack-N-Cheese...🔥🔥🔥... Going back for a Fiesta Bowl....

name: Jacquie Fazekas-Woodcock
text: Amazing food and healthier than most. I love that I can customize my bowl with lots of veggies! Come all Vegans…or folks on a mission to eat healthier. Great dining option or drive-thru.

name: Keyara Collins
text: Never going again food was horrible $20 for a plate of small end ribs with no meat just black inedible black crust around the edges and there was exposed bone on each piece with the ends crusted with what I thought was meat but just burnt inedible crust then on top of that I asked would bbq sauce come with the ribs and I was told yes and once I got my food there was no bbq I spent $34 for food that I could not even eat I do not recommend

name: Michael Gibson
text: Totally not what I expected before I walked through the door. Had the surf and turf burger with the lobster sauce, and cajun ranch fried. It was awesome

name: Kayleigh Hilliard
text: The food was delicious and hot, hostess was very informative about the menu. I love the place. Stop by! They on point! I will return.

name: Madelaine Bowie
text: Love this place! I was first introduced to this restaurant for an event they had, and have been back several times afterwards. I must say they have been consistently 10 out of 10 in customer service, food quality, and overall vibe check.

name: Carrie Minton
text: Everything about this restaurant was great!  Such friendly staff who want you to have a great experience and the food was amazing!!  If you haven’t eaten here you are missing out.

name: Mac Mann
text: The food was amazing and so was the service. A top notch family owned restaurant. I was greeted at the door by TJ and the hospitality didn't end there. My waitress did an amazing job also her name was Darien. I even had the pleasure of meeting the owner Kachief who was not only very knowledgeable about culinary but was also very pleasant to have a conversation with. Very clean environment and the atmosphere was second to none!  I definitely enjoyed myself and look forward to returning to this establishment soon. Thank you to all who I had the privilege of meeting.

name: kethni jyles
text: I love 💝love💝love this place. The food is fresh and the atmosphere is awesome. This is my new party spot.🎉💯

name: Nicholas McCoy
text: This is an amazing place to eat. Great food and excellent customer service. I’ll recommend this place 10/10. I can’t wait to go back.

name: Cottrelle Eatman
text: 2nd time going, love loved both times 1st I had the red snapper fried, green beans and mashed potatoes, it was sooo good. light jazz playing great date place, the 2nd  time I had grouper(love fish) and lamb chops awesome the music was a little loud couldn't hear my conversations across the table,All in all it will be every other weekend dinning. great food.

name: Positive Development
text: Great ambiance, and  fantastic food! Definitely a great vibe. Will definitely plan my next event here!

name: Reginald Davis
text: A new place to eat off of Finley Ave, from a unique menu with a southwestern flavor. I did enjoy the chicken bowl this trip. Check them out.

name: Craig Minton
text: Rasta Pasta, collard greens and smack-N-cheese all delicious. Great service too!

name: Hunter Krug
text: Absolute FIRE! Unique and authentic flavors, plenty of food on the plate, awesome people!! These guys do it right.

name: damon Anderson
text: Amazing place! Food was very great customer service is superbly efficient!

name: Caron Lee
text: Awesome atmosphere, food is dope and the service is soo good. Omg the food, yo be ready to come again, again and again!!!!

name: deedee Dozier
text: 🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰 BEST RESTAURANT IN THE CITY! CAN Y'ALL ADD TURKEY TO THE MENU?

name: Jauwanna Moore
text: We visited this restaurant today and the food and customer service was awesome!

name: GiGi Kinn
text: Burger was juicy and good but fries were awful and the soda was out but didn't realize it till I left

name: aprilk Odom (Ms205eyekandi)
text: Seasoned and cooked very well . Pleasant atmosphere

name: April Devaughn
text: Pleasant vibe.  Entree was excellent.

name: Shameeka Smith
text: Perfect. Food is delicious. I'm going to continue to go

name: Ed Fields
text: Good food, good prices, in a great ambiance.

name: katrina Davis
text: Excellent great customer service

name: Mandrell Mitchell
text: Love it I tell everyone about it

name: Tracy Duncan
text: Absolutely delicious food.

name: Curves Again
text: This place was amazing

name: Ebony T
text: OMG!!! me and family went here for dinner last night. Everything was awesome! My son had a burger, my daughter had the loaded potato, my husband had the lamb chop dinner and I had a chicken salad. The portions are very fulfilling. The only thing I didn't like was the soda. It taste very flat. Not sure if they need a better machine but other than that. I definitely will be back SOON

name: Lissa D
text: The food was delicious, seasoned, and full of flavor. Amazing! Can't wait to go back.

name: Kenneth Richardson
text: 5 star venue & cuisine!!

name: Jon Knight
text: Soul food. Enough said.

name: Shedina Walls
text: Love Love Love the Food ‼️😋👌🏾

name: Jennifer Fritschi
text: This was a hidden gem. The food changes daily and they only use fresh, local ingredients. It's southern meat n 3 with a modern flair. I had the most amazing cornbread with peach butter made from Alabama's Chilton County peaches. Most meat n 3's I've been too, the food it overcooked and bland. At Relish Cafe, the food is so well seasoned and flavorful. I wish it was a meat n 6 because it was hard to pick just 3 of the amazing looking sides. Their fried green tomatoes were the best I've ever tasted.

name: Jamie White
text: I have eaten at Relish Cafe many times and never have I been disappointed. The food is always fresh and the portions are more than adequate. I would recommend this cafe to anyone who enjoys a good meal at a reasonable price.

name: The Traveling Family
text: Great food.. I got the catfish (came with 2 pieces) with mac &cheese and broccoli casserole and it was great.

name: Greg Pennington
text: Wonderful home cooking and we need to support them because they are a little hard to find

name: Kimberly Cowens
text: Great food great service

name: melessia johnson
text: Very good hamburger steaks. Nice home atmosphere. Good prices too.

name: Jaxon
text: Honestly, only ate here once but when i left i was a changed man i never seen this world the same since i ate here. This is a 23rd century restaurant with fine cuisine. I recommend everyone to eat here at least once a hour.

name: Vicky Roberts
text: Love it food great!!

name: todd demartin
text: We love this place. Always good food and amazing service.

name: Sarah Cotham
text: Amazing food and great service!

name: Michael Benefield
text: I was great food and great customer service.

name: slow hand
text: Great (meat and 2 ),

name: MO Mules
text: We ate here once, wasn't real happy with the food or service, more like an.inconvenience to be there for them

name: Rodney Hopkins
text: Awsome catfish

name: cindy henderson
text: Catfish was very good.

name: molly Elliott
text: You gotta try the smoke chicken

name: Brian Baker
text: very goof

name: beth mays
text: It was ok

name: Rudy D
text: To tried this for the first time today, my only regret is not trying it sooner. The smoked chicken was good af. The Mac and cheese and green beans were very good. Please stop by the owner is a friendly person and offered good service. Please support.

name: Ceason Williams
text: The price was high for how much food we got but she is very nice

name: John Garrison
text: Best soul food ever. awesome.

name: jacqueline “Jaci” simmons
text: Five stars for taste, four stars for service because of the wait and offered selection. They definitely need more advertising. I would also suggest chicken and dumplings. Overall very good cooking!!!!!!

name: Jazmine Toney
text: Great soul food.

name: Joe Van den Berghe
text: Nettie Bells is what real soul food is all about.  Fresh, perfectly cooked, and made with love and pride.  Great conversation, generous portions, and very reasonable pricing.  It was a joy to eat family recipes that you know have been passed down for many generations.  Places like this are few and far between these days.  For the price of a meal at the drive thru you can get some real food!  Do yourself a favor and give it a try.

name: Cesaly Grey
text: The food here is delicious, and Miss Nettie Bell is as wonderful a host as she is a cook. I had a plate with pintos, green beans and mashed potatoes with cornbread, my friend had a plate with pulled pork, etc. and we each took a plate home for a family member. The chocolate pound cake is scrumptious, as well. This is a definite must visit!

name: ananise ervin
text: Love it

name: Robert Walker
text: Great old fashioned cooking like momma made!

name: Ryan Hernandez
text: I rank it up there with JW steakhouse the food so slap

name: Rebecca Melton
text: Best food ever

name: James Truffa
text: Good food

name: LaDarryl Banks
text: I called RDM catering less than 24hrs to prepare lunch. I have 50 plus employees. The portion sizes and the affordability is to be admired. RDM catering performed at the highest level of professionalism as well as quality. The food was hot fresh and tasty! It’s hard to please 50 plus people but there weren’t any complaints! As a busy manager catering services like this company is needed. RDM catering took the stress away!! I highly recommend this company!

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Banks,  we are glad that you had an excellent experience with us. We're grateful for the opportunity to serve you. Looking forward to doing business with you again.

name: Fitzgerald McCastle
text:
Dine in at RDM Catering.
The food Presentation and hospitality was amazing. The food was hot, well seasoned and tasty and the portion size servings were a standard amount of food. This was a very enjoyable experience. 💯

resp.text: We're glad that you had a great experience with us.  We look forward to seeing you again. Thank you for the review.

name: Natasha Price
text: If you’re looking for good Southern Cooking, RDM Catering is the place to go! The food is fresh and ready to serve whenever you have an appetite 😊 Customer service is also great and I highly recommend this place!

resp.text: Thank you Ms. Price for sharing your experience with us. We aim to please our guest by providing exceptional service and tasty Southern Cuisines. We hope to see you soon.

name: Manner Jimmie
text: Food is delicious and the hospitality is great prices is very reasonable, and the amount of food that they give is more than enough, it's the place to eat,

resp.text: Thank you Apostle Nickson for the kind words as you shared your experience with us. Our guest are important to us and we aim to please by providing exceptional service and Tasty SouthernCuisines. . We hope to see you soon.

name: Mary Kennedy
text: I just left RDM Catering and when I tasted the freshly made food I was so delighted. The food is worth the travel and the hospitality is great too!!

resp.text: Thank you Mrs. Moore for sharing your experience with us. Our customers are our priority therefore we aim to provide exceptional customer service and tasty southern cuisine. We hope to see you soon.

name: Gilbert Baird
text: I eat here a lot since I work nearby. I love how the customer service is always fantastic and they keep the place neat consistently. Prices are fair and they serve big portions.

resp.text: Thank you Gilbert for such a wonderful review. We're glad to know that we meet your expectations. We look forward to seeing you soon.

name: Rickitta McInnis
text:
This place has ABSOLUTELY great food and exceptional service.  We were greeted by the chef on arrival and the meal was fantastic.
It is very reasonable for the quality! I HIGHLY recommend this place. Be sure and check out his signature "crack punch"....absolutely addicting!!! We ❤ it here!!

resp.text: We appreciate your kind words and we're glad that you had a great experience. Our customers ROCK! Hope to see you soon and we'll have some crack punch waiting for you.

name: Shanavia Hinkle
text: I visited RDM Catering this past weekend. I called ahead and told them what I wanted. What I like most about my experience is that the owner  made sure my chicken was fresh. The chicken was seasoned to perfection, and the food was just all around good. Thanks and I can't wait until I visit you again.

resp.text: We appreciate your business and thank your kind words. We're glad that you enjoyed your meal.

name: Antriece Redwine
text: The food is absolutely amazing and they are always switching things up! The atmosphere is wonderful and full of warmth and community. You would be remisted if you don't try it out for yourself. 🤗😍

resp.text: Thank you for your kindness and words. We're glad your experience was amazing. We hope to see you again soon.

name: DENICE P
text: FANTASTIC food, good prices , ABSOLUTELY great customer service. Best place to go for soul food.  RDM catering gets 5 stars from me.

resp.text: We appreciate your kind words and your business.

name: Rachele Walker
text: My husband and I eat here almost every weekend. The food is so good and fulfilling. Customer service is awesome. Everyone is always kind and has our food out on time. Highly recommended.

resp.text: Our customers rock! We appreciate you and your family for their continued support.

name: Angellic Mitchell
text: That strawberry banana pudding is to die for. Please ask for the sweet tooth treat. You won't be disappointed.

resp.text: We appreciate your comment concerning our Sweet Tooth Moment. Strawberry Banana Pudding is one of our top sellers.

name: ernestine patton
text: I enjoy the fresh food. The meats are good and the veggies are very fresh. The cornbread muffins are very fresh  too.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words. We are glad that you have a great experience. Hope to see you soon.

name: Claude Jones
text: Food is delicious and filling love the veggies. Just awesome. RDM rocks!

resp.text: Thank you for your support and business.  Your kindness is appreciated

name: Joypeace31
text: Everything was wonderful from the customer service to the food!

resp.text: We appreciate you and we're glad you had an awesome experience.

name: Jvon Miller
text: Food always fresh hot and good 😋 and the service is always great and friendly!

resp.text: Glad you enjoyed and thank you for those kind words. Hope to see you soon.

name: WilliJ w
text: The food is delicious and the service is wonderful. Thank you for a meal well done.

resp.text: We appreciate your business and glad that you had a great experience.

name: timeria pratt
text: The food is absolutely delicious. Most definitely will continue to support.

resp.text: We appreciate your continued business. We aim to please!

name: Sheila Lawrence
text: GREAT FOOD! GREAT SERVICE! GREAT PEOPLE!

resp.text: We appreciate your business and kind words. We do our best to make sure each customer receives a great experience. We hope to see you soon.

name: Josh Palmer
text: Would recommend to anyone great food and great customer service

resp.text: We appreciate your business. We hope to see you soon.

name: Ronald Mcknight
text: Top notch services

resp.text: We're glad you had an exceptional experience!

name: Josh Palmer
text: good food and good service

resp.text: We appreciate your business and kind words.

name: Sherday Cole
text: The food is good quality!!!!!!!

resp.text: We appreciate your kind words. We aim to please!

name: Alec KELSEY
text: Fabulous food. Family owned,and they are the nicest people. If you want the best home cooked..and I mean real home cooked food from scratch..you have to go here. 5 stars

name: Alice Carson
text:
Hello everyone,I have eaten at aunt Josie for some years now,fresh vegetables,the meats are season just right, cornbread just like grandma,I taste a lot of the cooking I done back in the days, good downhome cooking,clean person,she cook a lot of years before retiring, try it you will love it.
God Bless and be SAFE

name: Lula Charles
text: It Is A Great Place To Eat At. Josie Is A Great Cook. If You Want Some GREAT Soul Food You Need To Go To J & R Soul Cafe.

name: Scott Shepherd
text: May be the best soul food in Tuscaloosa! Mrs. Abrams is the real deal... A wonderful cook and as friendly and welcoming as a host could be. Perfect lunch!

name: Jarret Ramsdale
text: I was looking for some good vegetables for lunch, and I found them. Miss J had turnip greens, collard greens, peas, macaroni & cheese, a few other vegetables and some meat. I had to get back to work quickly, and I was in and out in less than 5 minutes. The food is delicious, and Miss J was super friendly. I'll definitely be going back soon.

name: lawrence Holliday
text:
GREAT FOOD.!!!
Even Greater service.

name: Cornelius Little
text: I've been eating there for years and have not had a negative experience good food,quiet environment and a very pleasant and welcoming owner she has in a loyal customer in me

name: Deeldra Mack
text: My aunt's cooking is good .God thank YOU for 20 year .

name: David Llc
text: very good food ms josie abrams took care of us best soul food in town

name: k_ m
text: Loved everything about my experience! Delicious Southern food and warm service!

name: Vanessa Sims
text: J&R Soul Cafe was wonderful.We told Mrs.Abrams we were caught in traffic and on the way to Tuscaloosa.She was willing to stay open until we arrived.WOW.Was it worth it.The food was great!!! Yes I'll will return again.Thank you

name: Ericika Curley-Griffin
text: Good service and good food

name: Rhonda Williams
text: Mrs. Josie is such a sweetheart & good cook!!! A great place for meat and three!!!

name: Eboni Worsley
text: Food tastes delicious, but I'm salty that I paid $15 for this palm size super bowl. This is supposed to be a Large.

name: Francis Perdue
text: The food is consistently good. The family ran business is hospitable.

name: Tim Frederick
text: The side items like the slaw,fries and grits are delicious but the fish is average at best and the prices seem steep for what you get.Service is fairly good but I have had better.All and all average eating place

name: Martha M
text: I waited in line an hour last night to get some fried catfish and shrimp. I thought the add on of shrimp for 5.50 was fried shrimp for that price. It wasn't it was some baby shrimp like the kind you get from the dollar tree that was added to the grits. The cole slaw was good not the fish. It tasted burnt and very dry way to crispy and the thinnest catfish fillets I've ever purchased.. I will try the wings text time...

name: Reginald Bryant
text: Wait wasn't horrible.   Food was great as always.

name: Sherry T
text: Friendly staff good food, the coleslaw is really good.

text: Always a hit! If you haven't tried it... you should

text: I like the Catfish and double Cheese grits

name: Chrishon Glass
text: The food was off the hook

name: Maurice Hardin
text: Great service 👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍

name: Emily Smith
text: I tried this for the first ever today and I am just gonna say I will definitely be back😋😋 it was very good! Far as the employees they where very polite! Only thing I didn’t care for was the red velvet cake it was dried out and tasted old but everything else I had was amazing 💕💕

name: Shane Senn
text: Soooooo good omg!!! 😋

name: Eric Price
text: Food that makes you feel good inside and won’t break the bank, this is one of the best places to eat in Opelika. Get the Banana Pudding, you won’t regret it.

name: Candy Mitchell
text: The food was wonderful and the ladies in there were all just so sweet! Will definitely be coming back again.

name: Kenyetta Rumph
text: Delicious!!! I had fried chicken, yams, and dressing.... I also had black eyed peas and peach cobbler...absolutely no complaints!!

name: Ayana Rome
text: It’s always such a great pleasure going to Jahvon’s! The staff is very nice and there’s nothing like some good southern cooking!

name: May May
text: MOTHER'S LUNCHEON WAS GREAT!!!! FOOD & SERVICE WAS EXCELLENT!!!!!! REALLY NICE & PROFESSIONAL SERVICE . . . . RELAX N PLACE 2 EAT!!!! WILL VISIT AGAIN SOON . . . . GOOD LORD WILL N .

name: joe mudry (wildwolfhound)
text: I will never eat there again a drunk could cook better

name: Patrick Williams
text: Fried chicken, lima beans, and broccoli cheese casserole with a 'nana pudding chaser = YES PLEASE!! So good!! Menu changes daily - we also had catfish, green beans, and corn bread. Will definitely be back!!

name: F00d Is G00d
text: Very unprofessional, discourteous and dismissive attitude towards a customer who literally eats here once a week. I called in today 8/16 to make sure they have pork chops because last time I was told they were out. The woman on the phone says yes and never once said they are cooked to order nor is this listed anywhere on the menu( I called because so live 20 minutes away) once I get there they drop pork chops after me waiting in line for 15 minutes. 15 minutes later when my chops are ready is when they decide to tell me the things they are out of. So I say okay thank you I don't want anything as literally they were out of everything I wanted. I called upon leaving to make a suggestion that it should be listed on the menu that pork chops are made to order and that you all should have a sign of the things you are out of close to where you order and the woman was very dismissive, discourteous and extremely unprofessional. I will not spend another dime of my money here after spending a total of 50 minutes on this experience(driving there and then the wait time in restaurant) to leave with nothing. A few recommendations so you don't lose other faithful customers: List the things that are made to order on your menu, or let customers know when they call in. Have a list or sign of things that you have ran out of and train your employees to not raise their voice and be dismissive of customers. Thank you.

name: Justin Brown
text: Good fish on Friday Tuesday liver is good banana pudding is good too

name: Reginald Yancy
text: Great Customer Service and the food is good

name: Maurice Slaughter
text: Good soul food and not expensive for what they serve you!

name: Juwan Pugh
text: The best soul food i swear !!!!! Perfectly cooked chitterlings and oxtails 🔥🌶🔥 go try them and you will be amazed. ❤

name: Shan Boyd
text: The food was delicious. I got the ox tail an rice, cornbread, dressing,and potato salad. I can say I will be going back. Great job on delivering great food. Also the banana pudding was delicious too. 👏👏👏

name: Serena Mullins
text: Loveeeee this place!!! 🙌 I go at least once a week!!! Amazing food, clean environment & polite workers!!! Yummmmyyyy 😋

name: Patricia Griffin
text: CHITTERLINGS!! RED VELVET!! CHITTERLINGS!! OXTAILS!! CHITTERLINGS!!

name: Melanie Foshee
text: This is some great food!

name: Lee Ring
text: Great place for a sit-down lunch. Some of the best comfort food around.

name: Lavester Holloway
text: It's in a good location, the food taste good, the dining area is kept clean, and the customer service is inviting!!!😊👍

name: Montrez Smith
text: The lady at the cash register has a major attitude issue. I will not be back! Worst experience ever and I eat here a bit.

name: Doug Parkman
text: Off the chain good food!

name: Regina Miller
text: Fresh, hot food. Friendly service. Clean dining area.

name: Carl Bridges
text: Food and service are great!

name: Jennifer Moss
text: My family and I LOVE this amazing place!!!  We had enough food on our plates to eat twice!  We each had a meat and 3 sides then my daughter had to have the Banana Pudding and Red Velvet cake that were fabulous!!  I personally had the Ox Tails over rice with Greens, and Mac N Cheese...lets just say words can not describe how delisious this food was!!!  Ox tail is hard to find at a resonable price with actual meat on it but at Jahvon's, these were the biggest Ox Tail I had ever seen and let's not mention how tender! Everyone must try this place at least once, I promise you will go back!!  Thank you all at Jahvon's for your kind, warm welcome and service.

name: Carla Morgan
text: The food was good and the fried chicken had a good season on it!

name: Rodney Tellis
text: Taste good.

name: Darryl Grewe
text: Amazing

name: Red Uzzle
text: It's good and clean!!!

name: Janice Doler
text: Gteat food. The banana pudding taste homemade. The staff were very friendly. Great meal at a reasonable price.Just wish they stayed open a little longer each day.

name: Casey Whitson
text: Catered my friends wedding. Some of the best food I’ve ever had.

name: keeta reid
text: Best food ever ‼️

name: terrance leige
text: Friendly service

name: Gerda Martinez
text:
The ladies who work there are amazing....
The food is amazing.....
The atmosphere was great.....
I WILL BE BACK!!!!!

name: Joy Jones
text: I highly recommend coming here! The food is excellent the hospitality is good. If you want some good souls food and a full belly for a good price I recommend coming here. Around lunch time is perfect.

name: Nancy Daily
text:
Food was Excellent and the staff was amazing!
Will definitely be back.

name: Green Davidson
text: Both times I have been to this place the food has been great. I did dine in and take-out and I can say that both experiences were awesome. Good Food and friendly service.

name: Kevin “Kc” Mcgee
text: We are here working in town from Houston texas and the food was great... I'm not kidding you...we are going again today

name: GINA KING
text: Great home cooking good old soul food and Miss Linda she's a very sweet hard worker and  greet all of her customers. Everything that I've ever eat there is off the chain. It's a family-owned business. I'll be there all of my life

name: Donaldson Jones
text:
The food is down home country cooking! Try the hot water cornbread!
The servers are friendly.
The restaurant is clean.
The prices are reasonable.

name: Green Davidson
text: This place is amazing! The food is delicious and you get fast and friendly service.

name: Carol West
text: Food was delicious and service was good.  Large portions of great home cooking

name: willie garner
text: Great,  love it wouldn't eat any were else

name: Clint Dycus
text: I got fried pork chop 🥩 & sides, sides were good pork chop was way way over cooked, hard & tough. Very disappointing, threw over half away.

name: ashley williams
text: The food was great! Great service

name: Monicka Lemon
text:
I must have picked a bad Sunday morning to come. I was the first person through the door. Ordered before 11:30, it's now 12:34 and I'm still waiting. People came in after me, sat down and ate or took theirs to go and they are lo g gone. The only reason why I'm still waiting is because I'm not from Decatur and I've already placed the order. I'm hoping thos will be the best food ever.
Organization seems to be a problem here. I'm trying to keep it together, it's Sunday and I want to start the week off right. I seen this restaurant on Facebook and I  was visiting a friend in Decatur, figured I'd give them a try. At 12:40 I'm really regretting it

name: Gene Montecchie
text: Mom and Pop type restaurant. Down home country cooking. Fried chicken, pork chops, meat loaf, ribs, Mac and cheese, greens etc. Served deli style. Pic a meat and 3 sides. Sunday it stays busy. My ribs were just ok typical deli style...soaking in BBQ sauce....but the sides we're absolutely amazing!. Kids had fried chicken and enjoyed it. Wife had baked chicken and said it was good.

name: Beth Sorrells
text: Off the interstate,  small place, home cooking! Awesome Sunday meat and 3. Make you feel like family while you travel,  just dropping by to eat after church!

name: Matthew Person
text:
Home style cooking of good Southern food. No frills, just a good selection of 8 to 10 items to choose from. Fried chicken and the sweet potato casserole was very good.
Friendly staff.
Love not eating at fast foid joints, than try off the path, local restaurants.  We were driving from New Orleans to VA when we stopped in. Glad we did!

name: Chris Blount
text: I had the privilege of being treated to lunch here on a Sunday and it was incredible!  Literally some of the best food I've had in my life.  The next time I'm anywhere near Evergreen... I'm going back!

name: Don LeMay
text: Two or three meats to choose from in a few sides with dessert for $10 down home country food right here

name: Michael Thunderfist™
text: Soul food at it's finest. A joyful experience indeed.

name: Brittany Israel
text: Great hole in the wall to stop in. Good home cooking, clean, and fast.

name: Nakisha Cook
text: I'm always satisfied with portions and taste!! Great customer service😁

name: Gregory E Wesson
text: Soul food at it's finest! The sweet potatoes were awesome as well as the collard greens. Real food not pre-processed so called food many places serve now. Service and staff are friendly makes for a cool atmosphere. Give this place a try!

name: Deirdre Davis
text: My boyfriend and I really enjoyed the food. Nice and clean space very vibrant and unique colors on walls. I especially loved the cornbread dressing!!!

name: Larry Toler
text: It is a bit pricey, but there's no competition in the neighborhood. The employees are top notch and take pride in their food and customer experience.

name: Marvin Boyd
text: Great place with great service and great food

resp.text: We apologize for any inconvenience We look to improve your experience and service. If there's anything we could do give me a call at 205 201 3772

name: Darin Phillips
text: Good food

name: EPICSHE
text: Headed that way now, I told my husband I want some food not a snack!😊

name: AntRich
text: SOUTHERN COOKING!

name: Ken Black
text: This place was outstanding and a great surprise on a road trip. Great food, service, and hospitality. I was greeted when I came in, at a funny off hour after lunch, around 2:00 pm or so and told to sit where I wanted. I was greeted by the waiter who was super friendly and knew their menu well. I ordered some of my favorites when I can find them, regular southern food items that when seasoned correctly and cooked right, are a delight to the taste buds and stomach. Well I got my wish without having to even ask. From the first bite on, I was in heaven as there was perfection in the flavors and combination. I didn't want to stop eating and I didn't leave any on my plate either. It was wonderful. I sincerely hope if you're in the area, that you will stop in and try it. I had business next door at the Astro Tops shop. But since it was a while since I ate I wanted to get something quick as I had to get on the road down to Mobile. This place made me want to find a reason to stay in the area so I could eat there again, it was that good. The water there, and it's the city, caused the tea to have a slight off flavor but it was still fine. But the food was WONDERFUL. I'll be back, it was worth it and then some. Great job people!

name: Travel More
text: Great Service.  Delightful family-owned, local restaurant.  A matriarchy of southern food, Ms. Mary, her daughter Ms. Trina, and her granddaughter Ms. Mariah.  These ladies will serve you classic Southern food. It will make you happy.  Go. Now.

name: Torey Mccaney
text: Some places can do a fancy breakfast... this place does a GOOD breakfast! Seasons delivers exactly what you need in a down home, Southern breakfast. And phenomenal customer service. The people are the best!

name: Penny Queen
text: Very friendly staff, quick service especially for to-go orders, clean and a comfortable atmosphere. The food is tasty and homemade.

name: Russell Mitchell
text: I love the food I love the people breakfast homemade pancakes good soul food

name: Robert Gagnon Photography
text: We stopped in for our first taste of Soul Food and were immediately welcomed with Southern hospitality. An amazing experience feeling like being at home, while on the road. The food is delicious and satisfying. I never recommend restaurants but I had to make an exception for Seasons. Truly a wonderful experience.

name: Michael Wert
text: Yummy lunch with the wife! Nice quiet jazz playing in the background makes a relaxing spot! Friendly service too!

name: Amy Watkins
text: It was good for first time and waitress was so nice will go back

name: Kevin Turner
text: The staff there is extremely polite and very accommodating you will have a good experience. The menu is not very expansive but everything you need, good moods good foods

name: Sherry Crosslin
text: New restaurant in East Florence. Food is tasty, hot and fresh. I think the server and cook are family and own the restaurant, they are very attentive and care if you like your food.

name: Lynn Wray Dillard (Alabama Creeks)
text:
My first visit was love at first bite. Seasons is a local family owned and operated restaurant. The front door is spectacular and leads into a roomy dining area with lots of tables (high and low) and pleasant decor.

The food has that homemade touch and portions are beyond generous. My waitress was helpful, kind and sincere (she wasn't playing for a nice tip). The owner checked in with me and was a true southern gentleman.

Can't wait to try their breakfast early on a Saturday.

name: L johnson
text: The orders was wrong a friend ordered meat and vegetable plate everything was wr8ng. I ordered a cheeseburger and fries and cheeseburger was over cooked fries soggy

name: gunnergraphics
text: Good moods good food. Service was excellent as well as the food. The burger was cooked perfectly with beautiful fresh vegetables on it. Mrs. Mary and her friendly staff will take good care of you.

name: Paula Grigsby
text: Love the food and the service is definitely the best... Great restaurant with hometown feeling!!!!

name: Milos Winston
text: Excellent food and Service!! A definite try if you are looking for a delicious home cooked meal!!!

name: Samantha Bradley
text: The food was pretty good, but the service was quite bad!

name: Randy Menne
text: Best all around breakfast and lunch. Owners and workers are the best too.

name: jackie hornbuckle
text: Depressing atmosphere, food could be better

name: Ginny Brown
text: The breakfast is excellent & the lunch menu is varied & the philly cheesesteak burger is amazing......  the fries are included & steak fries....  cooked just right...  highly recommend eating here..

text: Loved the food and the service!!!! I will be back when I am in town again.

text: Very pleasant atmosphere, Saturday morning was slow, but service and food were outstanding. Owner came to talk to us and others in the dining area. We will go back of we are on town!
